languages.text: "Заварить двери отсека, шаттлы заминировать. Пусть знают, что я оставляю им лишь один путь — исполнить свой долг во имя Императора".
"Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."
languages.original_text: "Заварить двери отсека, шаттлы заминировать. Пусть знают, что я оставляю им лишь один путь — исполнить свой долг во имя Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Seal the bay doors, mine the shuttles. Let them know that I leave them no choice but to carry out their duty before the Emperor."
"Seal the bay doors, mine the shuttles. Let them know that I leave them no choice but to carry out their duty before the Emperor."
"Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty before the Emperor."
"Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty before the Emperor."
"Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."
"Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

languages.text: «Sellen las compuertas de las bahías y minen las lanzaderas. Quiero que quede claro que su única opción es cumplir su deber en nombre del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: «Sellen las compuertas de las bahías y minen las lanzaderas. Quiero que quede claro que su única opción es cumplir su deber en nombre del Emperador».

languages.text: 「ベイの扉を封鎖して、シャトルに地雷を仕掛けろ。皇帝の名において、任務を遂行する以外に選択肢はないと伝えるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイの扉を封鎖して、シャトルに地雷を仕掛けろ。皇帝の名において、任務を遂行する以外に選択肢はないと伝えるんだ」

languages.text: “封锁舱门，在穿梭机附近埋设地雷。我要让所有人明白：他们别无选择，只能以帝皇的名义履行职责。”
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: “封锁舱门，在穿梭机附近埋设地雷。我要让所有人明白：他们别无选择，只能以帝皇的名义履行职责。”

languages.text: "Versiegelt die Modultüren und verseht die Shuttles mit Minen. Lasst sie wissen, dass ich ihnen keine andere Wahl zu lassen gedenke, als ihre Pflicht dem Imperator gegenüber zu erfüllen."
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: "Versiegelt die Modultüren und verseht die Shuttles mit Minen. Lasst sie wissen, dass ich ihnen keine andere Wahl zu lassen gedenke, als ihre Pflicht dem Imperator gegenüber zu erfüllen."

languages.text: « Scellez les portes des différentes baies et piégez toutes les navettes. Faites-leur bien comprendre qu'ils n'ont d'autre choix que d'accomplir leur devoir au nom de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."

traits.locale_text: « Scellez les portes des différentes baies et piégez toutes les navettes. Faites-leur bien comprendre qu'ils n'ont d'autre choix que d'accomplir leur devoir au nom de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Güverte kapılarını kilitleyin ve mekiklere mayın döşeyin. İmparator adına vazifelerini yerine getirmekten başka çareleri olmadığını söylediğimde ne demek istediğimi öğrensinler."
languages.original_text: "Seal the bay doors and mine the shuttles. Let them know that I mean to leave them no choice but to carry out their duty in the Emperor's name."
